*** Card scanner
https://www.positivedevice.com/pages/download

USB card scanner that can read and write to cards.
Can read credit cards, game cards, etc

Write to the card by using the provided program to write something, and then swipe the card to write to it.

Supports windows/macs, linux has some reverse engineered libraries for it.

*** Blank cards

Can buy blank cards to program on internet, some examples cards:
